name: Bibliotheca Sanctum
quote: Imperator, the unveiling of our illustrious Bibliotheca Sanctum marks a new dawn. Here, the greatest minds of Arkanthéa converge, forging enlightenment in service to the Imperium’s eternal reign. -Senator Vellor Quintarion

name: Domus Bellica
uniques: New [Military] units starts with [20] XP [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
quote: Imperator, the Domus Bellica stands tall. Within its stone and flame, soldiers are forged through discipline so brutal, it rivals the torments of hell. They train not just to serve — but to challenge the very gods, should war break upon us. -Praefectus Caelus Verrian, Master of War Doctrine
